title: Sapphire eSports recruitment
body:
Sapphire eSports is a new organisation looking to recruit talented LoL players to demonstrate their abilities in the coming Oceanic Open Ladder. We are currently recruiting  players for **Sapphire Blue**, the sister team to the existing Sapphire roster. 

Requirements
- Access and use to a Mic and TS3
- Willingness to learn and adapt
- Willing to develop as a player
- Seeking to play LoL at a competitive level
- Attendance of practice/tournaments throughout the week

Preferred
- Diamond 3+
- Fluent and clear communication (English)
- Competitive Experience

All positions will be trialled.

>**Thanks for the interest, applications are now closed**

Look forward to meeting you ♥
_
(Im not on the team, I'm just recruiting)_
